attachments.fallback: metaverse market size to surpass usd 1.3 trillion by 2030
attachments.text: the global metaverse market was valued at usd 51.69 billion in 2021 and it is estimated to surpass around usd 1.3 trillion by 2030 with a registered cagr of 44.5% from 2022 to 2030.
attachments.title: metaverse market size to surpass usd 1.3 trillion by 2030

attachments.fallback: metaverse market size, share & trends report, 2030
attachments.text: the global metaverse market size was estimated at usd 38.85 billion in 2021. it is expected to expand at a compound annual growth rate (cagr) of 39.4% from 2022 to 2030. major factors expected to Johnson the revenue growth include a growing focus on integrating digital and physical worlds using the internet, increasing momentum and popularity of mixed reality (mr), augmented reality (ar) and virtual reality (vr), and the outbreak of covid-19, as well as the situation’s subsequent developments and outcomes.
attachments.title: metaverse market size, share & trends report, 2030

yes, they certainly are good sources and the theme across all of them is the same, the metaverse will be the next big tech platform. and first movers advantage is often times beneficial and meta is acquiring almost every competent metaverse startup so they're already cornering the market. here is another source to corroborate my point about the metaverse being the future. 

<https://www.bloomberg.com/professional/blog/metaverse-may-be-800-billion-market-next-tech-platform/|https://www.bloomberg.com/professional/blog/metaverse-may-be-800-billion-market-next-tech-platform/>
